name: Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval (nguyenthai-duong)
description: [项目级] Built and deployed scalable LLM retrieval APIs on a hybrid GCP architecture with full CI/CD, IaC, and monitoring。来源: https://github.com/nguyenthai-duong/Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) systems combine generative AI with information retrieval to provide contextualized answer generation. Building reliable and performant RAG applications at scale is challenging. In this project, I deploy a continuous and highly scalable RAG application on Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) using CI/CD. This is my first project as a Machine Learning Engineer (MLE), and I learned from [FSDS](https://fullstackdatascience.com/). The image below shows my overall system architecture:
![systempipline](images/1_architecture.png)

**Technology:**
* Source control: Git/Github
* CI/CD: Jenkins
* Build API: FastAPI
* Containerize application: Docker
* Container orchestration system: Kubernetes (K8s)
* K8s's package manager: Helm
* Data Storage for pdf: Google Cloud Stor

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
kubectl create clusterrolebinding <your_name_space>-admin-binding \
  --clusterrole=admin \
  --serviceaccount=<your_name_space>:default \
  --namespace=<your_name_space>

kubectl create clusterrolebinding anonymous-admin-binding \
  --clusterrole=admin \
  --user=system:anonymous \
  --namespace=<your_name_space>

name: Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval/ansible 模块
description: [模块级] Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval 项目的 ansible 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/nguyenthai-duong/Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval

genes.title: ansible 模块说明
genes.content:
You can use the same project with GKE as long as you have enough `quota`, or you can create a new project. In this guide, I used the same project as above. Download the service account key in JSON format; instructions are below:
![](images/15_downloadkeyjson.gif)
After obtaining the JSON key file, move it to the `ansible/secrets` folder and update the **service_account_file** and **project** variables in `ansible/playbooks/create_compute_instance.yaml`  corresponding with path secret file alread

genes.content:

ansible/inventory
ansible/playbooks
ansible/playbooks/create_compute_instance.yaml
ansible/playbooks/deploy_jenkins.yaml
ansible/requirements.txt

genes.title: ansible 代码示例
genes.content:
cd ansible

conda create -n ansible python==3.9 -y
pip install -r requirements.txt

ansible-playbook playbooks/create_compute_instance.yaml

name: Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval/embedding 模块
description: [模块级] Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval 项目的 embedding 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/nguyenthai-duong/Deploying-RAG-on-Kubernetes-with-Jenkins-for-Legal-Document-Retrieval

genes.title: embedding 模块说明
genes.content:
Since my data pertains to Vietnam's law, I use an embedding model that is trained specifically for Vietnamese words. Run the following bash command to deploy it on Kubernetes:
```bash
helm upgrade --install text-vectorizer ./embedding/helm_embedding --namespace emb --create-namespace
```
After executing this command, several pods for the embedding model will be created in the `emb` namespace.

genes.title: loki 模块说明
genes.content:
Loki is used for collecting logs from Kubernetes, while Prometheus scrapes metrics from Kubernetes and the LLM’s container. Since Prometheus scrapes metrics from the LLM’s container locally, you need to add a job for it in `./prometheus1/values-prometheus.yaml`
```bash
prometheus:
  prometheusSpec:
    additionalScrapeConfigs:
      - job_name: 'tgi-public-metrics'
        scrape_interval: 30s
        metrics_path: /metrics
        scheme: https
        static_configs:
          - targets: ['nth

genes.content:
prometheus:
  prometheusSpec:
    additionalScrapeConfigs:
      - job_name: 'tgi-public-metrics'
        scrape_interval: 30s
        metrics_path: /metrics
        scheme: https
        static_configs:
          - targets: ['nthaiduong23.pagekite.me']
